name: HOTPUNK 77
description:
It's the year 3000. You wake up to a world where the only want to make be known is to have followers. Only, you have to gain followers by defeating others. You are torn by your own mortality and didn't want to hurt innocent people. The best thing for you now is to defeat society's worse. 

To the prison on the moon. Lunar Max IXCI. 

Let the rampage begin...
